languages.text: "Не падайте духом! Обещаю, что вытащу вас отсюда!"
"Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"
languages.original_text: "Не падайте духом! Обещаю, что вытащу вас отсюда!"

traits.locale_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"
"Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"
"Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"
"Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

languages.text: “别放弃希望！我保证会把所有人都救出去！”
languages.original_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

traits.locale_text: “别放弃希望！我保证会把所有人都救出去！”

languages.text: 「気を落とすな！私がみなをここから連れ出すと約束しよう！」
languages.original_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

traits.locale_text: 「気を落とすな！私がみなをここから連れ出すと約束しよう！」

languages.text: «¡Que nadie pierda la moral! ¡Puedo prometer y prometo que les sacaré a todos de aquí!».
languages.original_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que nadie pierda la moral! ¡Puedo prometer y prometo que les sacaré a todos de aquí!».

languages.text: « Ne perdez pas espoir ! Je vous ferai tous sortir de là, je vous le promets ! »
languages.original_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

traits.locale_text: « Ne perdez pas espoir ! Je vous ferai tous sortir de là, je vous le promets ! »

languages.text: "Verliert nicht euren Mut! Ich verspreche, dass ich Euch alle hier raushole!"
languages.original_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

traits.locale_text: "Verliert nicht euren Mut! Ich verspreche, dass ich Euch alle hier raushole!"

languages.text: "Cesaretinizi yitirmeyin! Söz veriyorum, hepinizi buradan çıkaracağım!"
languages.original_text: "Don't lose heart! I promise I will get you all out of here!"

traits.locale_text: "Cesaretinizi yitirmeyin! Söz veriyorum hepinizi buradan çıkaracağım!"
